70000.desc: Shows where the Boss is on the map for a short period of time.
70000.name: Beacon

70300.desc: Replenishes the HP of all allies in the surrounding area.
70300.name: God Crystal

70400.desc: Increases the Atk Power of all surrounding allies for some time.
70400.name: Atk Crystal

70500.desc: Increases the Def Power of all surrounding allies for some time.
70500.name: Def Crystal

70600.desc: Identifies the location of undiscovered bosses for some time.
70600.name: Detector

700000.desc: Boosts Atk by 50% for first 3 turns
700000.name: Lovely Charm

700003.desc: Boost to all parameters (15%) & Boost to spark damage (50%) & Boost to critical damage (50%) & Boost to Crit rate (15%)
700003.name: Jack's Soul

700004.desc: Boost to all parameters (15%) & Decrease in damage received from Fire & dark types (10%) & Boosts BB gauge fill rate (10%)
700004.name: Skalmold's heart

700005.desc: Green bauble for decorating a Christmas tree.
700005.name: Green Bauble

700006.desc: Red bauble for decorating a Christmas tree.
700006.name: Red Bauble

700007.desc: A fragment from a clay item.
700007.name: Fragment

700008.desc: Recovers HP when damaged (40% chance,  15% of DMG taken) & All status ailments invalid & Nullifies extra crit & Element based damage & +20% HP & +20% REC
700008.name: The Grail

700009.desc: Boost to Atk (50%) & Boost to critical damage (50%) & boosts damage to weaker elements (40%) & Boost to Spark damage (30%)
700009.name: Excalibur

700010.desc: Boosts Atk, Def, Rec, and max HP by 10%
700010.name: False Elgaia Emblem

700011.desc: Boosts DEF and REC by 10% & Reduction in BB gauge required for BB (20%) & Increases BB gauge after every turn (2-3BC)
700011.name: True Elgaia Emblem

700012.desc: Boosts ATK and max HP by 10% & Spark damage boosts BB gauge (1BC) & Critical damage boosts BB gauge (2-3BC)
700012.name: Secret Elgaia Emblem

700013.desc: 15% boost to max HP & recovers HP each turn (3,000~3,500 + 10% Rec) & Negates status ailments
700013.name: Seed of Yggdrasil

700014.desc: Boosts Atk, Def, Rec, and max HP (15%) & Nullifies all ailments and critical dmg & recovers HP each turn (3,000~3,500 + 10% Rec) & Boosts BB gauge when attacked (3-5BC)
700014.name: Hope of Yggdrasil

700015.desc: The inert and vanquished Corruption. Your contact with it leaves you filled with a sensation of great purity.
700015.name: Corruption

700016.desc: Llewxam’s tears... at their touch, you feel great sadness overwhelming you.
700016.name: Tears

700017.desc: Boosts all stats by 15% & Reduce BB cost (20%) & Increases BB gauge every turn (2-3BC) & Spark (1BC) and Critical (2-3BC) damage boosts BB gauge
700017.name: Perfect Elgaia Emblem

700018.desc: Adds Chance of Ignoring Enemy's Def when attacking (25%) & Boost all parameters (15%) & Boosts BB gauge when attacking (7-8 BC)
700018.name: Blink's Glasses

700019.desc: Adds Chance of Ignoring Enemy's Defense when Attacking (10%) & Boost all parameters (10%)
700019.name: Glass Fragment

700021.desc: Boosts all stats (15%) & Boosts crit. dmg.(80%) & Boosts BB Atk (100%) & Chance of return 25% dmg. when attacked (25%)
700021.name: Immaculate

700023.desc: 30% boost to Spark damage & 5% boost to ATK, DEF, REC, max HP
700023.name: Outsider's Badge

700024.desc: 50% boost to Spark damage & 10% boost to ATK, DEF, REC, max HP
700024.name: Challenger's Trophy

700025.desc: 80% boost to Spark damage & boosts BC (15%), HC (20%) drop rate when spark & 15% boost to ATK, DEF, REC, max HP.
700025.name: The King of Fighters

700026.desc: A beautiful poem written on an flaming paper. The verses release serenity and power.
700026.name: Kyo's Poem

700027.desc: A statue representing a worthy fighter Rugal once defeated. You can feel Rugal's rage and inhumanity!
700027.name: Rugal's Trophy

700028.desc: A flask coming from a mysterious place...
700028.name: Destruction Essence

700029.desc: Boosts all stats (20%) & Boosts Spark damage (30%)
700029.name: Terrestrial Destroyer

700030.desc: Boosts all stats (35%) & Boosts Spark damage (50%) & Negates status ailments
700030.name: Astral Destoyer

700031.desc: Boosts all stats (70%) & Boosts Spark damage (150%) & Negates status ailments & Boosts BB gauge on Spark (1-2BC)
700031.name: Galactic Destroyer

700032.desc: Boost to all stats (15%) & Boost to BB gauge fill rate (25%) and BC drop rate (10%) & Fill BB gauge when taking damage (2-3 BC)
700032.name: Ardent Coal

700033.desc: A strange pumpkin seed possessed by the soul of a warrior.
700033.name: Pumpkin Seed

700034.desc: Collect these essences to craft the Soul of Krantz.
700034.name: Essence of Krantz

700035.desc: Collect these essences to craft the Soul of Sirius.
700035.name: Essence of Sirius

700036.desc: Collect these essences to craft the Soul of Avant.
700036.name: Essence of Avant

700040.desc: A seal offered to those who are worthy.
700040.name: Courage's Seal

700041.desc: The Chocolate that lovers offer each other during an ancient celebration.
700041.name: Lovers' Chocolate

700042.desc: Evolve Don Juan Sergio and spread love throughout Grand Gaia.
700042.name: Love Crystal

700043.desc: 30% all parameters (male unit only) & boosts Spark damage (50%) and BB ATK (100%) 2 turns when Sparks have exceeded 20
700043.name: Sergio's Wedding Ring

700044.desc: 30% boost to all parameters (female unit only) & boosts Spark damage (50%) and BB ATK (100%) when HP is full
700044.name: Julia's Wedding Ring

700045.desc: An orb filled with the essence of Power itself.
700045.name: Power Essence

700046.desc: Old legends tell that this jewel holds the power of seas and oceans.
700046.name: Jewel of the Waves

700047.desc: Collect 40 feathers to craft the item required to evolve Migina.
700047.name: Feather of the Phoenix

700049.desc: Collect these pumpkins to craft the Spooky Lantern.
700049.name: Spooky Pumpkin

700050.desc: Collect 8 emblems to craft the Perfect Ishgria Emblem.
700050.name: Ishgria Emblem

700051.desc: Boosts all parameters (50%) & damage reduction (5%) & boosts Spark damage (120%) & boosts BB gauge each turn (8 BC) & raises ATK parameters to 150000
700051.name: Perfect Ishgria Emblem

700052.desc: Boosts all parameters (30%) & boosts BB ATK (200%) when HP are full & negates elemental damage & reduce damage taken (5%)
700052.name: Super Spookfest Lantern

700053.desc: Revives one ally from KO status (at 75% HP).
700053.name: Grail's Elixir

700054.desc: Use this item to craft Book of E.N.D.
700054.name: Dark Aqua

700055.desc: Use this item to craft Diamond Key
700055.name: Light Aqua

700056.desc: Gives you permission from Htilit to craft the Super Spookfest Lantern.
700056.name: Super Spookfest Ticket

700057.desc: Combine 16 Spooky Lantern Spheres with a Super Spookfest Ticket to obtain the Super Spookfest Lantern Sphere,
700057.name: Spooky Lantern

700058.desc: Use this material to make the "Siegfried's Fanged Gun".
700058.name: Dragon's tooth

700059.desc: Use this material to make the "Siegfried's Propelled Shield" sphere.
700059.name: Dragon's horn

700060.desc: Use this material to make the "Siegfried's Doping Shoulder Blade" sphere.
700060.name: Dragon's blood

700061.desc: Boosts all parameters (15%) & boosts ATK (100%) when BB gauge is over 50% & boosts BB ATK (100%) & raises ATK parameter limits to 150000
700061.name: Siegfried's Fanged Gun

700062.desc: Boosts all parameters (15%) & boosts DEF relative to remaining HP (50-100%) & negates ATK, DEF, REC reducing effect & resistance against 1 KO attack after activating OD
700062.name: Siegfried's Propelled Shield

700063.desc: Boosts all parameters (15%) & negates all status ailments & boosts OD gauge fill rate (30%) & damage taken boosts BB gauge (3 BC) & adds status ailment removal effect to BB/SBB
700063.name: Siegfried's Doping Spaulder

700064.desc: Use this material to make the ”Siegfried's Hybrid Weapon” sphere.
700064.name: Dragon's scale

700066.desc: Obtain 6 copies of this item to craft a powerful Sphere.
700066.name: Omega Essence

700067.desc: Boosts to all parameters (45%) & boosts ATK (50%) when BB gauge is full & boost BB ATK (150%) when HP are above 50% & boost elemental damage (100%)
700067.name: Siegfried Draconic Rage

700068.desc: Premium Skin Material: Via Evolution, use on a "Dark Path Arthur" Unit to activate the following skin: "Hope Champion". (This permanently changes its name and art/pixel art)
700068.name: Mystical Stone

700069.desc: This precious stone celebrates an amazing BFRPG year full of exciting releases! Distributed in the Special 2017 Parade, it grants exceptional rewards if you have enough of it!
700069.name: 2017 Jewel of Remembrance

700070.desc: Boosts all parameters (35%, female unit only) & boosts Spark damage (60%) & boosts BB ATK (120%) and BB gauge each turn (4 BC)
700070.name: Julia's vow

700071.desc: Boosts all parameters (35%, male unit only) & boosts Spark damage (60%) & boosts BB ATK (120%) and elemental damage (50%) for 2 turns when Sparks have exceeded 15
700071.name: Sergio's vow

700072.desc: The bouquet will allow you to craft the ultimate lovers' sphere!
700072.name: The bride's bouquet

700073.desc: Boosts all parameters (45%) & boosts Spark damage (80%), BB ATK (140%) and elemental damage (100%) & boosts BB gauge each turn (8 BC)
700073.name: Wedding announcement

700074.desc: Spring is here! The wind sweeps petals everywhere in Grand Gaia!
700074.name: Spring Petal

700075.desc: Ladybugs mean that spring has landed and symbolize happiness!
700075.name: Spring Ladybug

700076.desc: Boosts all parameters (30%) & reduces BB gauge required for BB (20%) & boosts BB gauge each turn (4 BC) & Spark damage and damage taken boosts BB gauge (1 BC and 3-4 BC) & boosts elemental damage (50%)
700076.name: Spring Shard

700077.desc: Boosts all parameters (40%) & restores HP each turn & damage taken may restore HP (40% chance 30%) & additional damage reduction (50%) & adds status ailment removal effect to BB/SBB
700077.name: Divine Timeless Scepter

701000.desc: This is a part of a great shining spirit. It is a lighthouse for the dead.
701000.name: Valkyrie Spirit

701002.desc: Boosts all stats (30%) & Boosts BB gauge each turn (5 BC) & Negates all status ailments
701002.name: Odin's Ring

701003.desc: Boosts all stats (30%) & Chance of inflicting ailments when attacked (8-10%) & Boosts damages dealt to foes with ailments (50%)
701003.name: Surt's Blade

701004.desc: A strange shard from the mirror world.
701004.name: Mirror Shard

701005.desc: Boosts HP and DEF (10%) & negates defense ignoring, elemental and critical damage
701005.name: Explorer's Journal

701006.desc: Use this material to craft the Noblesse Title Sphere.
701006.name: Noblesse Emblem

701007.desc: Boosts critical damage (50%) & Critical damage boosts BB gauge (3-5 BC) & Boosts ATK (50%) for 2 turns on critical
701007.name: Noblesse’s Wedding Ring

701008.desc: Boosts HP and ATK (30%) & Boosts ATK (50%) when BB gauge full & Boosts spark damage (50%) when HP full
701008.name: Hunting Guide

701010.desc: Boosts ATK (50%) & Boosts ATK (50%) when BB gauge full & Boosts damages to ailed ennemies (50%) & Chance to inflict weakness (15%)
701010.name: Admiral's Hook

701011.desc: Boosts HP (30%) & Boosts ATK (80%) when HP is full & Boosts BB ATK (150%) & Negates elemental based damage
701011.name: Tracker's Crossbow

701012.desc: Boosts DEF (40%) & Fills BB gauge when attacked (3-5BC) & Chance (10%) to reduce damage to 1 & Raises normal hit amount (+1)
701012.name: Gilgamesh Crown

701013.desc: Boosts ATK / DEF (40%) & Boosts spark dmg (75%) for 2 turns when dmg taken exceed certain amount (5k) & Probable Spark crit. (30%)
701013.name: Aries' Hammers

701014.desc: Boosts HP (40%) & Fill BB gauge (7BC) when 15 HC received & Boost DEF relative to HP lost (0-100%) & Negates elemental damage
701014.name: Armor of the Fallen

701015.desc: Boosts HP/ATK (30%) & Boosts OD fill (20%) & Boosts dmg. on ailed foes (50%) if dmg. dealt exceed 10K & 25% Chance to reflect dmg.
701015.name: Propaganda Codex

701016.desc: A strange robot that came from a distant kingdom.
701016.name: Photon Bot

701018.desc: Boosts HP and ATK (30%) & Boosts Spark damage (70%) for 2 turns when 20 sparks done,  & Spark fill BB gauge (1-2BC)
701018.name: Cursed Photon Rod

701019.desc: Boosts ATK and DEF (70%) when BB gauge full & Boosts Spark dmg (70%) for 2 turns when dmg dealt > 10k & Negates DEF ignoring damage
701019.name: Photon Assault Spear

701020.desc: Boosts HP (40%) & Fill BB gauge (7BC) when 10 HC received and OD fill rate (20%) for 2 turns when 20 HC received
701020.name: Temporal Cybernetic Skin

701021.desc: Boosts HP, DEF and REC (15%) & Reduce BB cost (15%) & Damage taken fills BB gauge (1-2 BC) & Negates status ailments
701021.name: Photon Scepter of Summoning

701022.desc: Boosts HP and ATK (40%) & Boosts DEF and REC (50%) for 2 turns when damage taken has exceeded certain amount (10 000) & boosts elemental weakness damage (50%)
701022.name: Arthur's Will

701023.desc: Boosts ATK, HP (30%) & Boosts BB Atk (100%) when Sparks have exceeded certain amount (20) & Boosts Spark damage (50%) when HP are full
701023.name: Caliburn

701024.desc: Boosts HP (30%) & Boosts Atk relative to how high HP is (0-100%) & Boosts BB gauge each turn (6 BC) and when attacked (3-4 BC)
701024.name: Arondight

701025.desc: Boosts HP (30%) & Boosts ATK, DEF, REC (60%) when BB gauge is full & Negates DEF ignoring damage
701025.name: Winter's Bells

701026.desc: Boosts all param. (30%) & boosts ATK, DEF, REC based on how low remaining HP is (10-80%) & reduces BB gauge required for BB (15%)
701026.name: Ancient Cybernetic Crown

701027.desc: Boosts all parameters (20%) & boosts DEF relative to remaining HP (0-40%) & chance to add Spark vulnerability (25% chance) for 1 turn
701027.name: Wastelands Sailor Hat

701028.desc: Produced by a long-forgotten technology, this object is much sought-after by the Apocalypse survivors.
701028.name: Damaged Tech

701030.desc: Boosts ATK (30%) & boosts ATK (50%) when HP are full & boosts BB ATK (100%) and damage against status afflicted foes (50%)
701030.name: Instable Flask

701031.desc: Boosts all parameters (35%) & boosts BB gauge each turn (3 BC) & damage taken boosts BB gauge (2-3 BC) and may restore HP (20% chance 30% damage)
701031.name: Enhanced Bubble Generator

701032.desc: Tech used onboard the ship of ancient times. Allows the creation of powerful devices.
701032.name: Hydro-Dynamo

701033.desc: Boosts HP (40%) & boosts ATK, DEF, REC (80%) for first 3 turns & negates all status ailments & boosts BC efficacy (30%)
701033.name: Plumatachi's Glasses

701034.desc: A generator created using anything and everything. At the moment, it doesn’t allow you to produce too much energy; however, it can surely be improved.
701034.name: Recycled Generator

701035.desc: Boosts all parameters (35%) & boosts Spark damage (30%) & boosts BB ATK (80%) & reduces BB gauge required for BB (10%)
701035.name: Deathbringer Bandana

701036.desc: A powerful lens that allows light to converge, transforming it into a ray. By combining multiple lenses, one could produce a destructive ray of light.
701036.name: Converging Lens

701037.desc: Boosts ATK (50%) & boosts elemental damage (50%) & boosts BB ATK (100%) & Spark damage boosts BB gauge (1 BC)
701037.name: Customized Reactor

701038.desc: Boosts HP (50%) & boosts ATK when BB gauge is full (50%) & boosts OD gauge fill rate (20%)
701038.name: Drill Sharpener

701039.desc: Boosts all stats (20%) & boosts Spark damage (50%) and BB ATK (100%)
701039.name: Apex Sword

701040.desc: Boosts all stats (20%) & boosts BB gauge when attacked (3-4 BC) & reduces BB cost (15%)
701040.name: Apex Ring

701041.desc: Boosts all stats (20%) & Spark damage reduction (50%) & restores HP each turn
701041.name: Apex Shield

701042.desc: Boosts Zel (20%), Karma (15%), Item drop rates (5%) & Enhances Eyebrows (900%) & Removes chance of resisting temptation. I mean, be honest, those eyebrows are just the best.
701042.name: Elie's Glassbrows

701043.desc: Has no effect, can be sold. If you can read this, a real version of this Sphere will be distributed to you in early July. Sorry for the wait.
701043.name: Fake Apex Jewel

701044.desc: Boosts all parameters (35%) & boosts BC efficacy (30%) & boosts BB ATK (100%) & damage reduction (5%)
701044.name: Apex Jewel

701045.desc: Boosts all parameters (20%) & boosts ATK (50%) when BB gauge is full & boosts BB ATK (150%) & boosts Spark damage (80%)
701045.name: Hunter Title

701046.desc: Use this material to craft the Hunter Title.
701046.name: Hunter Trophy

701047.desc: Boosts all parameters (20%) & reduces BB cost (15%) & damage taken fills BB gauge (1-2 BC) & boosts Spark damage (80%)
701047.name: Pure Noblesse Title

701048.desc: Use this material to craft the Pure Noblesse Title.
701048.name: Shapeshifter Insignia

701049.desc: Use this material to evolve Enki to Dream Evolution.
701049.name: Primordial Stone

701050.desc: A gigantic skeleton found within an ancient desert.
701050.name: Bones of a Fallen

701051.desc: Boosts all parameters (50%) & boosts Spark damage (100%) & boosts BB ATK (150%) & adds probability of resistance against 1 KO attack (70%) & negates elemental damage
701051.name: Armor of Superiority

701053.desc: Boosts ATK and REC (40%) & boosts elemental damage (50%) & boosts Spark damage (100%) & chance to add Spark vulnerability (25% chance) for 1 turn
701053.name: Old Crown Fragment
